name: Alexandra Barcelona A DoubleTree By Hilton

reviews.text: I stayed for 4 days at the Alexandra in February. The taxi ride from the airport took about 25 minutes, and check in was efficient and swift. I had booked a superior room, and found it to be very confortable and had no problems at all with noise from traffic.
reviews.title: Excelent Hotel

likes.liked: — Clean and confortable room , perfected situated for a vacation in Barcelona

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel is very well situated for both sightseing or shopping, and very close to excelent restaurants and tapas bars. Gaudi*s La Pedrera ( Casa MIla) is only 2 blocks away, the Ramblas even closer and you can easy walk to the Sagrada Familia ( about 1,4Km).
reviews.title: Great Location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Breakfast is expensive , you get a much better deal by having breakfast at a nearby place for about 7 euros( turn left walking out of the hotel) just 50 meters away .
reviews.title: 4 nights in Barceloa

likes.liked: — Great shower and comfy bed. yummy Breakfasts
likes.disliked: — Could smell cigarette smoke from nearby room on some occasions

reviews.title: Beware roadside rooms
reviews.text: The metro system connects the hotel with the rest of central Barcelona within 15 minutes. The metro stations closest to the hotel are Diagonal and Passieg de Gracia. There is also a wide choice of buses. The hotel can order black-and-yellow taxis on request, but it is cheaper to stop one.

reviews.title: super hotel
reviews.text: I would come back anytime, can recommend it to everybody, but it would be nic e if the WIFI internet in the rooms was complimentary !

reviews.title: Highly overrated
reviews.text: I was overall disappointed with my stay at this hotel. The staff is arrogant and rude and was not very helpful. At one point I bought an internet card which did not work and returned to the front desk for another one and the clerk said that I was causing "too many problmes" in Spanish to her co-worker. Since I am fluent in spanish I told her not to bother and left. The rooms are TINY and I mean tiny by european standards. There is ALOT Of construction so the lobby is really not existent. The positives are the hotel is clean and modern and in a great area but I will not be staying with them again.
4 stars - you have to be kidding me.
reviews.title: Horrible

reviews.text: This place was a nightmare. Why?
reviews.title: Good hotel (despite the building work)

reviews.text: First - the staff. I walk in and they look at me like i am bothering them by checking in. The whole time, they were so discourteous to me. There was 2 people who showed some decency - the head waiter in the resturant and the maintence guy. The rest were horrible.
reviews.title: very disappointing

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Second - although it is a block away from Casa Mila - it is SOOOO noisy. I stayed on the second floor and hardly slept.
reviews.title: Junior suites highly recommended

likes.disliked: — building work in progress at time of stay - a plunge pool would be make a great hotel perfect

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The Hotel has a great position especially for shopping, being just next to Passeig de Gracia. Be sure breakfast is included in your rate because I had to spend 34 extra EUR for 2 people. The personnel is quite gentle, the (standard) rooms have everything you need, but the problem if your room is on the street is the NOISE. The rooms are not sound isolated and so you can clearly hear all the drunk people on the street late at night and the traffic early in the morning. I was at the 2nd floor, I don't know if above was the same... Anyway I thing it doesn't worth what i've paid for (240 eur for one night)
reviews.title: Much Ado...

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We have just come back from a 3 night stay in Barcelona. The hotel was very central for sightseeing.
reviews.title: Lovely hotel and Great breakfast choices

likes.liked: — Huge comfy bed snd cleanliness of rooms

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed at hotel Alexandra for 4 nights Aug 5 - Aug 9. The hotel is pretty decent, nothing special really. When we were there there was a cosntruction going on in the lobby. Not that it bothered us too much, the workers would separate the working zone from the rest of the lobby with some kind of drapes, but still you could hear the hammer and drill and etc. You would think why couldn't they choose the lower season for this, and not the one when there are thousands of tourists in town. The room was ok, always very clean, plenty of toiletries. The hotel is about 15 minutes walk from Plaza Catalunya, but you can quite entertain yourself visiting designer shops on your way to the center, so with all the shopping it's not gonna seem that long. And of course it's close to different attractions, and Bus Touristic stops. There is no bathtub in the bathroom, just the shower. We had breakfast at the hotel, it was quite good, the same every morning, but plenty of variety (in my opinion): several kinds of cold meat, cheese, cerial, bacon, srambled eggs, fruits, juice, pastries. Price of breakfast was included in the room rate, but usually it costs 17 euros, quite expensive, considering tons of restaurants in the area where you can have breakfast for twice as cheap, an starbucks around the corner. We used room service once on arrival, the food was brougt to our room really quickly, in about 10 minutes, but tasted pretty average. Hope my review will help someine who's choosing a hotel to stay, like all the reviews posted here helped me when i was looking for a hotel.
reviews.title: Hotel is ok, but beware of construction in the lobby.

reviews.text: After reading a couple of reviews of this hotel dating 2005 I was more than reluctant to book this hotel -but then again, it was very close to my meeting venue and couldn't afford to lose time early in the morning with traffic jams or complicated public transport. So it was a pleasant surprise to end up in this fancy place walking distance from anything that's important in Barcelona's city centre. At the time of my stay they were still renovating part of the lounge, which must be why it is so different from the hotel portrayed in the mentioned reviews.
reviews.title: That was a (nice) surprise

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Abundant, scrumptious though a bit pricey breakfast...
reviews.title: Location above all

reviews.text: Me and My wife visited in Barcelona to celebrate our anniversary.
reviews.title: Designer hotel in great location

reviews.text: The Hotel is placed perfectly for us since we like to tour by foot. The great location saved us the tiering routine of catching the Metro to go to the first site of the day. Also returning to the hotel is quite easy since the Metro station (Diagonal) is a block away. Near the hotel you will find many Tapas Bars and great shopping.
reviews.title: Disappointed!!!

likes.disliked: — Too expensive for type of room they offer

aka: Alexandra Barcelona A DoubleTree By Hilton Catalonia
